column4: I cannot run Login Setup in gnome, I get an error saying "...Authentication Rejected....Could not access GDM configuration file"
anybody know how-to get around that error? I have never been able to run Login Setup
can u send it to me too.
yep
are you done yet?
no but i have the new Audio Adrenaline cd
I think so, but totally different genre of music then System Of A Down
in the same genre of System of  A Down, I know the new Mudvayne and Demon Hunter cds are pretty sweet
ok..bak to blogging the nvidia drivers...
i haven't forgotten, but had a problem with eclipse...just fixed it now
ok... i will ask you to review my blog...to make sure it's accurate...since you'll have recent experiecne by then =) (that is if you're around and don't mind)
doesn't that have to do with the ZAxisMapping stuff in the xorg.conf ?
open a terminal and run, "sudo gedit /etc/X11/xorg.conf"
ok i will try
then do a Ctrl-F and search for ZAxis
in a terminal, do "cd /etc/X11"
then do a "ls"  and let me know if you see a xorg.conf file in there
it probably says "4 5"   , correct?
switch them to "5 4"
yep and  then you need to restart X, by hitting Ctrl-Alt-Backspace ...and then relogin
Ctrl-Alt-Backspace actually kills X, but default ubuntu installs will automatically restart the things for you
i agree with polpak. wait until they're done. You can save it whenever
whenever you're name is mentioend, XChat highlights the line in red
so this is red to you?
